menuitem.name: Hummus platter with falafel
menuitem.description: 300 g of hummus with 10 freshly made crispy falafels

menuitem.name: Oat fritters
menuitem.description: Hungarian oat fritters with mashed potatoes, onions and braised cabbage

menuitem.name: Cellery soup
menuitem.description: Creamy cellery soup with croutons and herbs

menuitem.name: Thai Curry
menuitem.description: Thai vegetable curry with lentil and brown rice

menuitem.name: Penne Carbonara
menuitem.description: Sweet tender leeks with golden smoky pancetta, cracked black pepper and Parmesan

menuitem.name: Sirloin Steak
menuitem.description: Chargrilled to your liking and served with herby garlic butter, fresh horseradish, Parmesan, baby gem and funky chips

menuitem.name: Veal Milanese
menuitem.description: Stuffed with prosciutto and fontal cheese, breadcrumbed and topped with a fried free-range egg and black summer truffle and skinny fries

menuitem.name: Cheeseburger
menuitem.description: beef patty, cheddar cheese, romaine lettuce, tomato, red onion, homemade burger sauce
